name: Singapore Transport System
description: Contain questions about Singapore's transport system

examples.input:
Which MRT station serves as an interchange between the North South Line and the East West Line?
A) Jurong East
B) Kent Ridge
C) Promenade
D) Bugis

Which MRT station is not served by the Circle Line?
A) Kent Ridge
B) Holland Village
C) Marymount
D) Cityhall

Which MRT station is the westernmost station on the East West Line?
A) Lakeside
B) Boon Lay
C) Pasir Ris
D) Raffles Place

Which MRT station is located near Singapore's Changi Airport?
A) Woodlands
B) Bukit Panjang
C) Expo
D) Lavendar

Which MRT station is part of the Thomson-East Coast Line?
A) Pioneer
B) Newton
C) Great World
D) Upper Changi

Which is the shortest path to travel from Boon Lay to Woodlands?
A) East West Line transfer at Jurong East to North South Line: Boon Lay > Jurong East > Woodlands
B) East West Line to Raffles Place, transfer to North South Line: Boon Lay > Raffles Place >  Woodlands
C) East West Line transfer at Outram Park to North East Line: Boon Lay > Outram Park > Woodlands
D) East West Line to Bishan, transfer to North South Line: Boon Lay > Bishan > Woodlands
examples.target: A) East West Line transfer at Jurong East to North South Line: Boon Lay > Jurong East > Woodlands

examples.input:
Which of the following is NOT an MRT station in Singapore?
A) Serangoon
B) Bedok Reservoir
C) Sentosa Cove
D) Kallang

Which MRT station is not served by the Bukit Panjang LRT?
A) Caldecott
B) Segar
C) Teck Whye
D) South View

Which MRT station is located near Sentosa?
A) Mountbatten
B) HarbourFront
C) Labrador Park
D) Tiong Bahru

Which MRT station does not have a bus interchange?
A) HarbourFront
B) Bishan
C) Toa Payoh
D) Tai Seng

What is the station code for Bukit Panjang MRT?
A) NS27
B) DT1
C) EW21
D) CC4

When was the original East-West Line completed?
A) 1983
B) 1984
C) 1990
D) 2000

When was the East-West Line expanded to the Tuas West Extension?
A) June 2023
B) January 2017
C) March 2020
D) June 2017

How many stations were there on the North-South Line when it started in 1987?
A) 5
B) 11
C) 13
D) 14

When did Punggol LRT open?
A) 1993
B) 1997
C) 2000
D) 2005

Which year saw the introduction of the Public Transport Council (PTC) in Singapore?
A) 1987
B) 1990
C) 1995
D) 2000

What is the primary governing body for public transportation in Singapore?
A) Land Transport Authority (LTA)
B) Public Transport Council (PTC)
C) Ministry of Transport (MOT)
D) Singapore Transport Agency (STA)

Which online platform does LTA provide for the public to access real-time information on public transport services?
A) MyTransport.SG
B) SG Transport Info
C) LTA Live
D) TransitLink

Which LTA project focuses on expanding our cycling path network?
A) Park Connector Network (PCN)
B) Cycling Plan 2030
C) National Cycling Plan
D) Islandwide Cycling Network

In which year was the Land Transport Authority (LTA) in Singapore established?
A) 1990
B) 1995
C) 1998
D) 2000

Which initiative aims to expand the Park Connector Network to create a 360 km 'Islandwide Loop'?
A) PCN 360
B) Round Island Route
C) Green Connector Loop
D) National Greenway

Which government agency is primarily responsible for developing and maintaining the Park Connector Network (PCN) in Singapore?
A) National Parks Board (NParks)
B) Land Transport Authority (LTA)
C) Urban Redevelopment Authority (URA)
D) Housing & Development Board (HDB)

In which year was ComfortDelGro Corporation formed?
A) 2000
B) 2003
C) 2005
D) 2010

What type of services is ComfortDelGro primarily known for in Singapore?
A) Airline services
B) Taxi and bus services
C) Train services
D) Maritime services

ComfortDelGro operates bus services under which subsidiary in Singapore as of 2023?
A) SBS Transit
B) SMRT Buses
C) Go-Ahead Singapore
D) Tower Transit

What type of public transport services does SBS Transit primarily provide?
A) Taxi and ferry services
B) Bus and rail services
C) Airline services
D) Maritime services

In which year did SBS Transit begin operating as a public transport company under its current name?
A) 1997
B) 2000
C) 2003
D) 2005
